solution_line_template: Since there are {ml_per_liter} milliliters in 1 liter, then {goal_liters} liters is equal to {goal_liters} x {ml_per_liter} = <<{goal_liters}*{ml_per_liter}={goal_ml}>>{goal_ml} milliliters.
She needs to drink {goal_ml}/{ml_per_drink_session} = <<{goal_ml}/{ml_per_drink_session}={num_drink_sessions}>>{num_drink_sessions} sets of {ml_per_drink_session} milliliters of water.
So, she will be able to drink a total of 3 liters after {num_drink_sessions} sets x every {hours_per_session} hours = {total_hours} hours.
